name: Kody's Cleaner Twitter
description: The new-new Twitter 2014 design (from March-April update) is comming, with BIG text? Let's reduce it a bit and make it slimmer! (Still working with 2015 new design (and as of February 2016))

user.name: MKody97
user.about: I'm Kody, I live in Switzerland and I enjoy cartoons.
